values.description: [PAWN_nameDef] jaws are shifting, sticking out further than normal. Other more sublte changes have also begun on [PAWN_possessive] face, but it's hard to say what they are.
An uncanny feeling of familiarity comes when looking at [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. Even as the changes continue something of the old [PAWN_nameDef] can still be seen.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s face looks vaguely human at a glance, but with a protruding jaw, a flattened nose, and a raised forhead ridge it's clear something has been monkeying around with [PAWN_possessive] DNA.

[PAWN_nameDef]'s face looks vaguely human at a glance, but with a protruding jaw, a flattened nose, and a raised forhead ridge it's clear something has been monkeying around with [PAWN_possessive] DNA.
